column1: Welcome to CAT BASE!*Prepare yourself for battles here!*＠*＠*＠*＠*
Fighting in previous*stages does not give you*full XP as first time.*＠*＠*＠*＠*
Working-Cat earns money*and it's really important.*Do invest in UPGRADE!!*＠*＠*＠*
Of course Cats love CAT FOOD!*Cheers to CAT FOOD!*＠*＠*＠*＠*
ENERGY will be recovered*as time goes by!*Wait until it recovers and*make a move!*＠*＠*＠*＠*
Time misspent in youth is*sometimes all the freedom*one ever has.*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*
Effects of Special Skill continues*among different chapters！*Collecting treasures in*previous chapters is an* effective way to get stronger!*＠*＠*＠*
If you face a difficult stage
column2: *collect Best Quality Treasures to* make cats relly powerful！*＠*＠*＠*
